name: NeoCube
description: Neocube is the puzzle game in which you try to find a way to pass a number of test chambers by using the unique features of a cube.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8/10 Processor: 1.7 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D compatible graphic card DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: Any sound card Additional Notes:
